name: Nike Air Max 97 Triple White Wolf Grey

details.description: This Nike Air Max 97 "OG" edition comes in a white, wolf grey and black colorway. Made to commemorate the 30th Anniversary of the classic Air Max silhouette. This pair sports a clean all-white upper and sole with the only hits of color coming from the grey branding. They were one of three colorways that dropped alongside each other. The release date was August 1st, 2017 where they retailed for $160 in men's sizes. This Nike Air Max 97 "OG" re-released in May of 2023. Fans of the Air Max 97 were very pleased with this colorway and it quickly became a must-have. Perfect for everyday use, you can never go wrong with an a white pair of kicks. If you're in need of a pair, hit up the marketplace to buy them. Those looking to sell can do so online today.

name: Nike Air Max 97 Triple Black

details.description:
Crafted from recycled materials, the Nike Air Max 97 Triple Black is covered in a black mesh and leather combination for a monochromatic look. The Nike Air Max 97 Triple Black is back, this time crafted from a combination of mesh and leather on a water ripple–inspired silhouette. Everything on the shoe gets the black-on-black treatment, including the laces, tongue, and Swoosh. 3M Scotchlite strips supply reflective flair to the monochromatic upper. A multi-window Nike Air midsole and scuff-resistant outsole round off the design.

The Nike Air Max 97 Triple Black was released in December of 2018 and retailed for $160.

name: Nike Air Max 97 Black White

details.description: This Nike Air Max 97 "OG" edition comes in a clean black and white colorway. Made to commemorate the 30th Anniversary of the classic Air Max silhouette. This pair sports a black-based upper with a white sole, black Max Air unit and white branding throughout. They were one of three colorways that dropped alongside each other. The release date was August 1st, 2017 where they retailed for $160 in men's sizes. Fans of the Air Max 97 were very pleased with this colorway and it quickly became a must-have. Perfect for everyday use, you can never go wrong with a black and white colored sneaker. If you're in need of a pair, hit up the marketplace to buy them. Those looking to sell can do so online today.

name: Nike Air Max 97 Photon Dust Malachite

details.description:
The Nike Air Max 97 Photon Dust Malachite combines a striking color palette with an age-old design. This model, known for its elegant profile and advanced comfort, showcases its distinct look and feel, which appeals to a wide audience.

The Photon Dust Malachite Air Max 97 by Nike blends mesh and smooth leather in Photon Dust, Dark Obsidian, and Malachite colors. The wavy overlays, characteristic of the Air Max 97, incorporate hits of green and black for contrast, while a white midsole highlights the full-length visible Air unit. A gum rubber outsole adds a practical and stylish touch. Introduced by Christian Tresser in 1997, this profile revolutionized sneaker aesthetics and remains a celebrated design in Nike's history.

As experts, we appreciate the Nike Air Max 97 Photon Dust Malachite's reflective accents on the wavy overlays, which enhance visibility in low-light conditions, and the rounded toe cap. This model was originally released on December 21, 2023, for $185 retail.

name: Nike Air Max 97 Black White Anthracite

details.description:
Featuring Max Air cushioning and a durable design, the Nike Air Max 97 Black White Anthricite brings a 90’s favorite to a new generation. The Nike Air Max 97 Black White Anthricite takes on a blend of materials, including reflective piping, water ripple lines, and full-length Max Air cushioning. The synthetic upper is lightweight yet durable, and it’s served up with welded overlays and a rubber outsole for traction. For the season, the Nike Air Max 97 Black White Anthricite takes on a black and white look, with the Swoosh done in white.

The Nike Air Max 97 Black White Anthricite was released in October 2019 and retailed for $160.

name: Nike Air Max 97 Comme des Garcons Homme Plus Glacier Grey

details.description:
The Nike Air Max 97 Comme des Garcons Homme Plus Glacier Gray combines in contrasting Glacier Gray and white shades on alternating suede and textile strips.

The Nike Air Max 97’s Comme des Garcons Homme Plus Glacier Gray upper portrays a water ripple with a gray suede mudguard and a white mesh. The pattern repeats through the vamp and tongue. The signature Swoosh is embroidered on the tongue logo and quarter panels in a white hue. Stemming from the counter through the heel notch is a webbing pull-loop with "Nike Air Max" printed in Silver Gray. The sole features a clear perforated Air sole unit spanning the entire length of the shoe. It is sandwiched by a white mid and outsole.

Our experts like the padding on the tongue and collar that add to the buoyancy provided by the Air sole. The sock liner also seats on a padded insole and features a Comme des Garcons logo. The Nike Air Max 97 Comme des Garcons Homme Plus Glacier Gray was released on September 9th, 2022, priced at $350.

name: Nike Air Max 97 OG Silver Bullet (2022)

details.description:
The Nike Air Max 97 OG Silver Bullet 2022 comes in a mixture of four colorways: white, black, university red, and metallic silver.

The top of this Original (OG) Nike Air Max model has a metallic silver finish inspired by the aluminum and titanium components of a mountain bike. Wavy overlays sit on top of the mesh base. The exterior of this sneaker is accented with a crimson Swoosh stitched on the tongue and on the quarter panel. Air units are included in the soles.

The Nike Air Max 97 OG Silver Bullet 2022 was released on November 11th, 2022, retailing at $185.

name: Nike Air Max 97 OG Golden Bullet (2023)

details.description:
Nike is bringing back a fan favorite just in time for Air Max Day, with the return of the Air Max 97 OG Golden Bullet (2023).

The Air Max 97 OG Golden Bullet uses the same color blocking pattern as the Air Max 97 OG Silver Bullet, but with golden counterparts. Nike used red Swooshes on the mesh uppers, and tongue. The gold sneakers sit on top of a clear air bubble unit that wraps around the midsole.

The Nike Air Max 97 OG Gold Bullet (2023) released March 7, 2023, with a retail price of $185.

name: Nike Air Max 97 Undefeated Militia Green (2020)

details.description:
The UNDFTD X Nike Air collaboration brings back a coveted flight jacket-inspired colorway originally in this Nike Air Max 97 Undefeated Militia Green (2020). The Los Angeles retailer’s take on the Nike Air Max 97 Undefeated Militia Green (2020) features olive green coloring throughout the mesh and leather upper, accented with a repeating string of Undefeated logos printed on the lowermost of the sneaker’s wavy overlays. Touches of Orange Blaze are noticeable on the outsole, tongue patch and anterior pull tab, and underfoot, full-length Max Air provides cushioning.

The Nike Air Max 97 Undefeated Militia Green (2020) was released in December 2020 and retailed for $180.

name: Nike Air Max 97 Multi-Corduroy (Women's)

details.description:
The Nike Air Max 97 Multi-Corduroy (Women's) is a shoe for women made with a unique mix of materials including corduroy.

This version of the Nike Air Max 97 is made with a layered corduroy upper. The wavy layers appear in different colors, and the direction of the fabric is also different, adding visual interest; directly under the laces, a dark pink layer is seen, then light pink, then mid-pink, light pink again, and then two layers of two shades of tan. A thick gray layer sits at the bottom forming the mudguard, while there is an opening above the arch on each side revealing beige corduroy. The lateral side is branded with the word Air in white stitching, while the other side features a white Nike swoosh. The padded tongue features a Nike swoosh and pull tab, while the heel features another pull tab with Air Max branding. A transparent Air Max unit runs under the entire shoe.

Our favorite thing about this shoe is the mix of corduroy, which is a unique material from which to construct a sneaker. The Nike Air Max 97 Multi-Corduroy (Women's) was released on November 9, 2023, for $185.

name: Nike Air Max 97 Black (GS)

details.description:
Dressed in Black, Anthracite, and White colors, the Nike Air Max 97 Black GS was launched as part of Air Max 97 sneakers appearing under Nike’s brands in Grade School Sizing.

The Black GS Nike Air Max 97 features a dominant Black upper contrasting with the White accents that features on the Sneaker’s lateral side’s Nike Swoosh that reappears on the tongue in the same color. The White color scheme also appears on the sneaker’s "Air Max" brandings on the heel tab. The upper design also features a Black lacing system meant to ensure a comfortable and secure fitting and the pull tabs ensure easy wear. The lower design features Air Max units in the midsole for cushioning and support and the treaded rubber outsole for traction.

Something we love about this Nike Air Max 97 Black GS. which was launched on 4th November 2021 with a suggested market retail price of $155, is its dual pull tabs on the tongue and the sneaker’s heel.

name: Nike Air Max 95/97 Ducks of a Feather Storm
Nike Air Max 97 SE M. Frank Rudy

details.description:
The Nike Air Max 97 SE M. Frank Rudy pays homage to the creator of Nike’s Air Max technology, Frank Rudy.

The sneaker features a visible Air Max unit that spans the entire length of the shoe and comes with large transparent windows. The lettering "EST. 1997" references the release date of Air Max technology and can be found across the Max Air unit on the shoe’s lateral side. In addition, the sock liner displays Max Air schematics. Overlapping mesh and leather panels create a wavy pattern along the sides of the shoe. Although the colorway boasts Black and Summit White, the Safety Orange details encircling the lace cage catch the eye.

Our experts like the incorporated reflective detailing, which provides visibility in low lighting. The Nike Air Max 97 SE M. Frank Rudy was released on March 9th, 2023, and retailed for a price of $185.

name: Nike Air Max 97 Off-White Menta

details.description: If you’re a fan of the Off-White and Nike collab then the Air Max 97 Off-White Menta might just be your new favorite shoe. This shoe comes with a grey upper, multicolor Nike "Swoosh", grey midsole, and a translucent sole. These sneakers released in October 2018 and retailed for $190. Place a Bid on these sneakers now on StockX before the bag goes up.

name: Nike Air Max 97 Metallic Gold (2017/2018)

details.description: There's a reason the classics never go out of style, and the Metallic Gold Nike Air Max 97 proves that point. Featuring an all-gold upper with red and black accents on the heel tab, tongue detailing, and midfoot swoosh, the precious metal-inspired colorway’s upper is offset by the white midsole with the 97’s full-length Air Max unit also arriving in gold. These hit shelves in May of 2018 after a successful drop in 2017, and were available at retail for $160. If you are a huge AM 97 stan, you need to hit Bid above and have these in your collection ASAP.

name: Nike Air Max 1/97 Sean Wotherspoon (Extra Lace Set Only)

details.description: The Air Max 97/1 Sean Wotherspoon is a perfect example of what Kevin Garnett was talking about when he yelled that "ANYTHING IS POSSIBLEEE!!" This ultra-special Nike Air Max 97/1 was originally part of a Nike design contest that Sean entered and ended up winning. Reportedly inspired by Sean’s love for vintage Nike hats from the 1980s, this shoe features both the upper of the Air Max 97 and the sole unit of the Air Max 1, a killer combo. The shoe also has a unique colorful corduroy upper with frayed edges, a truly one-of-a-kind look, with velour from toe to heel. These grails dropped on Air Max day 2018 (March 26th) and retailed at $160. If you’re an Air Max fan, these are a pair that is a must have in your collection and one that will be sure to turn heads. This no accessories version comes with an extra lace set only.

name: Nike Air Max 97 Black Dark Obsidian University Blue

details.description:
The Nike Air Max 97 Black Dark Obsidian University Blue paints the retro-inspired Air Max 97 in a dark colorway of Dark Obsidian, black, and University Blue with Pure Platinum accents.

Inspired by the fluid design of Japanese bullet trains, the Black Dark Obsidian University Blue Nike Air Max 97 displays waving lines on the side panels—a heritage detail. Synthetic leather replaces genuine leather on the upper, reducing the overall weight and creating a contemporary feel. Other upper materials include durable textile and tightly woven mesh. A crystal-clear Air Max unit provides springy cushioning in the foam midsole, while the rubber outsole grips the ground.

Our experts at StockX like the reflective details accenting the lines on the side panels. They provide subtle visibility in low lighting and highlight one of the sneaker’s defining features. The Nike Air Max 97 Black Dark Obsidian University Blue was released on November 1, 2022, and sold for $175.

name: Nike Air Max 97 Gundam

details.description:
The White, Black, University Red and Psychic-dressed Nike Air Max 97 Gundam is one of Nike’s Air Max 97 additions to their numerous brands on the market.

Some of the main features of this Gundam Nike Air Max 97 sneakers include; a predominant White dressed leather upper contrasting with Black, University Red, and Psychic Blue accents, a White tongue contrasting with University Red and Black accents, and the White-dressed shoe laces to ensure a comfortable and secure dressing. To conclude the upper design is the Black Swoosh on the lateral sides. Its lower design features a white-dressed rubber midsole for cushioning, full-length Air Max cushioning, and a Black treaded rubber outsole for gripping.

What our experts consider as the special feature of this Nike Air Max 97 Gundam that was first released to the market on 30th January 2020 with its retail price being $170 is its upper’s Black, University Red, and Psychic Blue-dressed panels that enhance the upper construction’s strength.

name: Nike Air Max 97 OG Silver Bullet (2022) (Women's)

details.description:
Featuring Metallic Silver, University Red, Black and White colors, this Nike Air Max 97 OG Silver Bullet 2022 W is one of the Nike Air Max 97 OG sneakers that appears mostly in women sizing.

The Silver Bullet 2022 Nike Air Max 97 OG W features a predominantly Metallic Silver-dressed mesh upper construction that is contrasted with the University Red Swoosh on the sides and Black sock lining and Black tongue tag. The tongue and the heel also feature pull tabs that are meant to provide comfortable and easier dressing. The design further features a rubber midsole dressed in White and translucent Air Max units for cushioning.

What our experts love about this Nike Air Max 97 OG Silver Bullet 2022 W that was released as part of Nike’s Air Max 97 OG variations on 11th November 2022 with a recommended retail price of $180 is the sneaker's lightweight and breathable constrictions that maximizes comfort when being used.

name: Nike Air Max 97 Light Bone Khaki Black

details.description:
The Nike Air Max 97 Light Bone Khaki Black takes a classic silhouette, dresses it in contrasting colors and textures.

The Light Bone Khaki Black Nike Air Max 97 features an upper with a base of black mesh. Reflective black synthetic overlays undulate along the upper, creating waves that glow in the dark. The striping under the laces also glows in the dark. Bone-colored textured leather rimmed with khaki suede overlays the mud guard, wrapping around the entire shoe. A bone-colored cut out textile window on the side panel features a black embroidered Nike Swoosh. Air Max branding appears on the vertical pull tab on the heel, locking in the aesthetic of this upper.

Our shoe experts especially love this shoe’s polyurethane midsole that houses a full-length visible Max Air unit for optimal cushioning. The black rubber outsole features a waffle pattern for traction and a white Nike Swoosh. The Nike Air Max 97 Light Bone Khaki Black was released on March 14, 2023, for a retail price of $185.
